architectural_notes: Make Internet Identity authentication optional for Activity 1 & 2 submission flow (use anonymous actor/session fallback when identity is not ready).
known_issues: Activities 1 & 2 can get stuck on “Connecting… Please wait while we establish a secure connection” and block Submit when Internet Identity connection does not complete.

existing_features.title: Update Activity 1 and Activity 2 pages so users can fill out and submit the forms without being blocked by Internet Identity authentication or identity-loading state.

Refactor the use of the SignInGate component on Activities 1 & 2 so that it does not gate the submission forms; if any content still requires authentication (e.g., viewing community contributions), gate only that specific content and keep submission accessible.

Adjust frontend submit/quote actions on Activity 1 and Activity 2 to rely on the anonymous actor when the authenticated identity is unavailable, rather than blocking based on identity-loading state (e.g., do not treat Internet Identity initialization as a hard prerequisite for submission).

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow anonymous users to submit Activity 1 & 2 responses without waiting for Internet Identity connection to finish

Update backend access control logic so anonymous principals are allowed to submit Activity 1 and Activity 2 responses (and can retrieve Activity 1/2 quotes if those are used immediately after anonymous submission).

projectName: Allow anonymous Activity 1 & 2 submissions without waiting for Internet Identity
